special_text:
Whenever you conjure one or more cards, you may scry 2.
[+2]: Conjure a duplicate of target land onto the battlefield under your control.
[-2]: Conjure a duplicate of target creature or planeswalker into your hand if it isn't a token. That target becomes a 1/1 Doll creature and loses all other card types and abilities.
[-6]: Scry 2, then exile the top card of your library. If it's a permanent, conjure three duplicates of it onto the battlefield.
